title: Prosecutors Open Criminal Probe Into Fed’s Powell, NYT Says
description: Federal prosecutors have opened a criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell over the central bank’s renovation of its Washington, DC, headquarters, the New York Times reported, citing officials briefed on the situation.
content: Federal prosecutors have opened a criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell over the central bank’s renovation of its Washington, DC, headquarters, the New York Times reported, citing officials briefed on the situation.
